title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 51 - Theatrical Accounting
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 51 - Theatrical Accounting

State Regulations
§ 51.1 - Definitions
§ 51.2 - Records to be kept by an issuer or other offeror of a theatrical production company
§ 51.3 - Financial reports to be rendered by a theatrical production company
§ 51.4 - Letter of transmittal by issuer or other offeror (to be submitted with unaudited reports)
§ 51.5 - Contents of financial reports
§ 51.6 - Exemptions

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 13, ch. III, pt. 51

Statutory authority: Arts and Cultural Affairs Law, art. 23

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
